article_title: State capture stand-off as Dudu Myeni opts to 'remain silent' on SAA
description: Former SAA chair Dudu Myeni on November 4 2020 told the Zondo commission of inquiry that she feared answering SAA-related questions could lead to her being criminally charged.
author: Multimedia LIVE

meta.description: Former SAA chair Dudu Myeni on November 4 2020 told the Zondo commission of inquiry that she feared answering SAA-related questions could lead to her being criminally charged.
meta.title: ‘I don’t want to incriminate myself’: Dudu Myeni refuses to answer commission questions

article_synopsis: State capture commission chair deputy chief justice Raymond Zondo spent two hours on Wednesday entertaining a tit-for-tat tussle between former SAA chairperson Dudu Myeni and evidence leader advocate Kate Hofmeyr.
title: ‘I don’t want to incriminate myself’: Dudu Myeni refuses to answer commission questions
